title: #1587 A Cascade of Apologies
itunes:title: #1587 A Cascade of Apologies
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the recent news that the Covid vaccines have been approved for toddlers leading Adam to a rant on crate training as well as highlighting one of his recent tweets on the subject. They also discuss the monkeypox media phenomenon as Dr. Drew attempts to bring sanity to the subject. Adam also brings up the story from September 2021 where Border Patrol agents were accused of 'whipping' Hatian migrants as he attempts to update Drew on the recent developments in the story.
